probably the biggest challenge of this
project was how to fit a piece of
architecture a substantial piece of
architecture into such a beautiful

of the forest not very beautiful things

through the middle of the property is

views it made sense just to quietly
bring the top meadow over and have it as

architectural green roof this is a field
on top of the house
